mapper.select: SELECT m.uid, m.user_id, m.user_name, m.user_rank, d.phone_num, d.addr, d.addr_detail, d.zip_code FROM tbl_member m LEFT JOIN tbl_member_detail d ON m.uid = d.uid WHERE m.uid = #{uid};
SELECT m.uid, m.user_id, m.user_pw, m.user_name, d.phone_num, d.addr, d.addr_detail, d.zip_code FROM tbl_member m, tbl_member_detail d WHERE m.uid = #{userUid} AND m.uid = d.uid
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_member m, tbl_member_detail d SET m.user_name = #{userName}, d.phone_num = #{userPhoneNum}, d.addr = #{userAddr}, d.addr_detail = #{userAddrDetail}, d.zip_code = #{userZipCode} WHERE m.uid = #{userUid} AND m.uid = d.uid

UPDATE tbl_member m, tbl_member_detail d SET m.user_pw = #{modifyPw}, m.user_name = #{userName}, d.phone_num = #{userPhoneNum}, d.addr = #{userAddr}, d.addr_detail = #{userAddrDetail}, d.zip_code = #{userZipCode} WHERE m.uid = #{userUid} AND m.uid = d.uid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_member (uid, user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_rank) VALUES (#{uid}, #{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userRank})
INSERT INTO tbl_member_detail (uid, phone_num, addr, addr_detail, zip_code) VALUES (#{uid}, #{userPhone}, #{userAddr}, #{userAddrDetail}, #{userZipcode})
